mapper.select: select region_no as regionNo, trip_no as tripNo, to_char(begin_date, 'yyyy. mm. dd.')||' ~ '||to_char(end_date, 'yyyy. mm. dd.') as tripDate, floor(end_date - begin_date) as tripDay, region_country||'-'||region_city as regionName from my_trip join region using(region_no) where trip_no in( select trip_no from trip_member where member_id = #{_parameter} ) order by trip_no
select dense_rank() over(order by trip_date) as tripDate, trip_spot as tripSpot from trip_detail where trip_no = #{_parameter} order by trip_date, trip_order
